data.app_name: FlyVRX - Fighter Jet Air Combat War Simulator
data.description:
A thrilling FlyVRX - Fighter Jet that allows you to ride realistic and endless sea and land missions. Strap yourself into the cockpit of a state-of-the-art fighter jet and prepare to embark on a thrilling journey that will push your skills and adrenaline to the limit.
As you take the role of a highly trained fighter pilot, you will face a myriad of challenges and missions that will test your flying prowess, strategic thinking, and combat skills. Engage in intense dogfights against skilled opponents, execute awe-inspiring aerobatic maneuvers, and master the art of air combat. 
The virtual reality aspect of FlyVRX takes the experience to a whole new level. With the use of VR technology, you will truly feel like you are sitting in the cockpit, with a panoramic view of the sky and the ground below. The immersive nature of VR allows you to instinctively look around, track enemy aircraft, and feel the exhilaration of flight in a way that no other medium can replicate.
FlyVRX - Fighter Jet Games Features:
- Virtual Reality Immersion.
- Easy and smooth controls & realistic navigation.
- Realistic Graphics and Environments
- Missions, Survival, and Dog-Fight Mode
- Cockpit Interaction and Controls
How to Play:
- Press “B” Button for Flare in Right Controller.
- Press “A” Button for Missile in Right Controller.
- Use Right Controller to grab joystick and control your
  jet maneuvers.
- Grab and increase throttle handle in cockpit on your left 
   to increase and decrease Jet speed.
